item.title: Helmet style
item.description: I recently stumbled uppon a nice idea to get a cool biking helmet: View on Mastodon I don’t like adding stickers to a laptop, and I don’t own a car. So that’d be the perfect solution!

item.title: In love with the Fediverse
item.description: I’ve been aware of the Fediverse for some time already. Basically this is a “Federated Universe” of different social networks, based on open protocols. You might have heard of Mastodon for example. Well, after reading an article about it (French version - Italian original version), I want to get involved in it. This summer I’m planning on building a new hardware server, and I’ll try to set up instances of Mastodon, PeerTube and FunkWhale.

item.title: Phone app to record usage
item.description: Following an idea from there, I’d like to write a small phone app to record my daily phone usage: number of times I switch the screen on number of apps used and their usage time … Ideally I would export all of that in a CSV file, and create some R scripts to plot all this (big) data.

item.title: Track podcast consumption
item.description: An idea, following the previous one: tracking my podcast consumption. I’m already using the one of PodcastAddict, but this is not detailed enough.
